metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart's call to action to the player to move on and begin their approach to entering High Hall.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with Volo and ShadowheartEnter dialogue with Shadowheart

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: High Hall. There's nowhere else to go... This is where it all ends.
0.context: NodeContext: Steeling her nerves/one last push.In high hall (an upper keep in the city - site of the final sequence of the game)

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: The sooner we kill this thing, the better.
1.context: NodeContext: Some foreboding. In the morphic pool (the cavernous lair of a netherbrain)
